channel.title: Xp from Npc's
channel.description:
Hi ,
I want to know something , maybe sounds stupid but ok , here we go
I spawned some npc's and i killed them , but when i hit a 20+ i go from 54 to 55...
My question is ...
How do i change the xp u get..
Like
if u hit a 1 u get 8 xp , like rs u get 4 xp if u hit a 1..
How i change that/???
